column4: Anyhow, I can't print anything since Jaunty, anyone got any ideas?
And my printer config freezes and won't show anything
yup
Err, I think, I have cups anyway
tried removing and installing cups?
will do
nah, same deal
still no printer config
what printer?
canon mp160, had it working fine too
did you use synaptic (search cups) and do complete removal?
simply yup, and then reinstalled. Actually lost a heap on removal (bluez cups etc) that i haven't put back on yet
yup, and then reinstalled. Actually lost a heap on removal (bluez cups etc) that i haven't put back on yet
just curious, have you tried shutting down, disconnect printer, boot, remove printer, shutdown, connect, etc.?
not in the last hour, but this prob has been since I upgraded, and I have rebooted many times since then. Do you mean since I reinstalled CUPS? I could
not just reboot, but shutdown and remove printer physically, boot. remove config printer, etc.
I haven't, but it is a usb printer, and it has been turned off in this time
I would try it.
let it find it again
k, back in 5 to let you know how it went.
No joy, but I don't think the issue is one of detection. The whole printer configuration freezes with no text, and needs a force quit to kill it. A-la windows.
